mapper.select: SELECT cm_idx AS messageId, ch_idx AS roomId, sender_id AS senderId, message_type AS type, cm_content AS content, image_url AS imageUrl, cm_date AS time FROM chat_messages WHERE cm_idx = #{id} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_messages (ch_idx, sender_id, cm_writer, message_type, cm_content, image_url, cm_date) VALUES ( #{chIdx}, #{senderId}, IFNULL(CAST(#{senderId} AS CHAR), 'unknown'), #{messageType}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO chat_reads (ch_idx, cread_reader, last_seen_message_id, updated_at) SELECT #{roomId}, #{userId}, COALESCE(MAX(cm_idx), 0), NOW() FROM chat_messages WHERE ch_idx = #{roomId} ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE last_seen_message_id = GREATEST(chat_reads.last_seen_message_id, VALUES(last_seen_message_id)), updated_at = NOW()

INSERT INTO chat_reads (ch_idx, cread_reader, last_seen_message_id, updated_at) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{userId}, COALESCE(#{upTo}, 0), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE last_seen_message_id = GREATEST(chat_reads.last_seen_message_id, COALESCE(#{upTo}, 0)), updated_at = NOW()
